articles.title: Jürgen Klopp should copy Manchester United formula to fix Liverpool mistakes - Liverpool.com
articles.description: Jürgen Klopp's Liverpool are struggling at the moment and in order to fix his problems, the Liverpool manager should look to copy Sir Alex Ferguson's methods.
articles.content:
As Jürgen Klopp summarized succinctly in his post-match press conference, there are no excuses for Liverpool's performance against Wolves on Saturday afternoon.

articles.title: Davis Cup: India relegated after losing to Denmark - Rediff.com
articles.description: The Indian Davis Cup team was relegated to the World Group II for the first time since the new format was launched in 2019 after losing the play-off tie 2-3 to Denmark.

articles.description: Parth Bhut capped off a dream game with a five-wicket haul after a match-turning century and half-century as Saurashtra won a memorable Ranji Trophy quarter-final against Punjab by 71 runs.
